name: HanumanChalisa-byGulshanKumar
0:
”Alexa, play Hanuman Chalisa”
”Alexa, start Hanuman Chalisa”
”Alexa, open Hanuman Chalisa”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hanuman chalisa
des:
The Hanuman Chalisa is a Hindu devotional hymn addressed to Lord Hanuman. It has been authored by 16th-century poet Tulsidas in the Awadhi language and is his best-known text apart from the Ramcharitmanas.
This skill play Hanuman Chalisa, that helps you in prayer. To continue listening say: resume, or say: stop to stop listening.
You can say:
"Alexa, play Hanuman Chalisa"
"Alexa, start Hanuman Chalisa"
"Alexa, open Hanuman Chalisa"
Please leave a review if you love this skill, reviews help us to improve the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
